data: To fine-tune llama-2, you can use Q Laura to instruct and ultimately push the model to the hugging face model Hub. You can create a repository in the model Hub and use lower adapters for later use. In this particular example, the fine-tuning is based on French quotes, inspired by a linked tweet and using a dataset credited to the same author. The process involves using a custom dataset in CSV format with three columns: instruction, input, and output.
